description: Creates a deployment for a manually deployed Amplify app. Manually deployed apps are not connected to a Git repository. The maximum duration between the CreateDeployment call and the StartDeployment call cannot exceed 8 hours. If the duration exceeds 8 hours, the StartDeployment call and the associated Job will fail.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for an Amplify app.

parameters.name: branchName
parameters.description: The name of the branch to use for the job.

parameters.name: fileMap
parameters.description: An optional file map that contains the file name as the key and the file content md5 hash as the value. If this argument is provided, the service will generate a unique upload URL per file. Otherwise, the service will only generate a single upload URL for the zipped files. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The job ID for this deployment. will supply to start deployment api.

nested_items.name: fileUploadUrls
nested_items.description: When the fileMap argument is provided in the request, fileUploadUrls will contain a map of file names to upload URLs.

nested_items.name: zipUploadUrl
nested_items.description: When the fileMap argument is not provided in the request, this zipUploadUrl is returned.
